title: Client Crashed in ranked champ select
body: My client crashed while in ranked champion select. Once I logged back in I was not given the option to join a game nor was i penalized for dodging. After a short period of time I was alerted that I was placed on Low Priority que and was marked for a loss due to a remake. I had no chance of joining back into this game and was penalized and placed in low priority que. Is there any way I could get loss prevented and have my low priority que lifted?

replies.body:
I took a look into this for you, and it seems that the game may have already been remade before being able to rejoin the match.  An account can be marked as a leaver for being a cause of [/remake](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ).  Multiple leaves can result in a lower priority queue, which may be the case for this account.  The only way to return to a good standing with [Leaverbuster ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)would be to consistently play without interruptions. 

 I'd be happy to help with any issues you are having, but I need some more details such as any errors you are receiving or what's being observed.  Let me know and I can lend a hand!
